Description: CONDITIONUSED - FRONT AND BACK OF BODY SHOW SOME SCRATCHES, SMUDGES AND A FEW SMALL DINGS - ELECTRONICS TESTED AND THERE ARE A COUPLE OF ISSUES - THE RHYTHM IS CURRENTLY NOT WORKING, MORE THAN LIKELY A LOOSE CONNECTION IN THE WIRES AS THE OTHER TWO SETTINGS WORK ON THE SWITCH - THERE IS ALSO ONE KNOB THAT WHEN TURNED, THE SOUND WILL CUT OUT AND THEN BACK IN WHEN THE KNOB IS TURNED A BIT MORE, AGAIN, I BELIEVE THIS IS JUST A LOOSE WIRE THAT NEEDS SOLDERING - EVERYTHING ELSE SEEMED TO BE WORKING AS IT SHOULD - GUITAR PLAYS WELL - PLEASE NOTE THAT THE GUITAR STAND IS NOT INCLUDED, IT WAS USED FOR PICTURE TAKING PURPOSES ONLY AUCTION INCLUDESEpiphone Les Paul Studio Black 6 String Right Hand w/ Gig Bag PAYMENT We accept PayPal paymentBUY WITH CONFIDENCEWe want you to love your purchase! SPECIAL INFORMATION FOR OUR INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERSWe ship internationally exclusively through eBay's Global Shipping Program.Due to customs and regulations in different countries, some items are ineligible for international shippingAll plugs are US Standard plugs and may not work in other countries. Title: Epiphone Les Paul Studio Black 6 String Right Hand w/ Gig Bag
ConditionDescription: FRONT AND BACK OF BODY SHOW SOME SCRATCHES, SMUDGES AND A FEW SMALL DINGS - ELECTRONICS TESTED AND THERE ARE A COUPLE OF ISSUES - THE RHYTHM IS CURRENTLY NOT WORKING, MORE THAN LIKELY  A LOOSE CONNECTION IN THE WIRES AS THE OTHER TWO SETTINGS WORK ON THE SWITCH - THERE IS ALSO ONE KNOB THAT WHEN TURNED, THE SOUND WILL CUT OUT AND THEN BACK IN WHEN THE KNOB IS TURNED A BIT MORE, AGAIN, I BELIEVE THIS IS JUST A LOOSE WIRE THAT NEEDS SOLDERING - EVERYTHING ELSE SEEMED TO BE WORKING AS IT SHOULD - GUITAR PLAYS WELL - PLEASE NOTE THAT THE GUITAR STAND IS NOT INCLUDED, IT WAS USED FOR PICTURE TAKING PURPOSES ONLY
